mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TC , ROWNUM AS RN , CEIL(COUNT(1) over() / #{rownum}) AS TPG , #{page} AS CURPAGE , TB.* FROM ( SELECT T4.RCGVP_KNM AS CUST_NM , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CUST_CD , T4.LOCARA_TNO AS TEL_AR , T4.EXNO_ENCR AS TEL_NO1 , T4.IDV_TNO AS TEL_NO2 , T4.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AS TEL_CO , T4.MEXNO_ENCR AS HP_NO1 , T4.CRAL_IDV_TNO AS HP_NO2 , T5.WK_EXCN_DT AS JOB_DATE , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', SUBSTR(T5.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, 1, 1)) JOB_GB , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', T5.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) JOB_GB2 , T6.SV_PROCS_CN AS PROC_TXT , T5.CST_SV_ASN_NO AS CST_SV_ASN_NO , SUBSTR(T5.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, 1, 1) AS WRK_GB , T7.PRTNR_KNM AS EMP_NM FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 ON ( T1.CNTR_NO = T3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T3.VL_STRT_DTM AND T3.VL_END_DTM ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 ON ( T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID ) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T5 ON( T1.CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T5.CNTR_SN AND T5.WK_EXCN_DT BETWEEN #{jobDateFrom} AND #{jobDateTo} AND T5.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('20', '92') AND T5.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T5.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T6 ON( T5.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T6.CST_SV_ASN_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T7 ON( SUBSTR(T6.VST_FSH_DT, 1, 6) = T7.BASE_YM AND T6.OG_TP_CD = T7.OG_TP_CD AND T6.PRTNR_NO = T7.PRTNR_NO ) WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY T5.WK_EXCN_DT DESC ) TB WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND (((#{page} - 1) * #{rownum} ) + #{rownum})
